snippet: A new exhibition at the Morgan Library & Museum has recordings of the former British prime minister’s speeches, as well as a collection of his writings.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews exhibition Churchill: The Power of Words, featuring recordings and writings by Winston Churchill, at the Morgan Library & Museum.
lead_paragraph: A new exhibition at the Morgan Library & Museum has recordings of the former British prime minister’s speeches, as well as a collection of his writings.

headline.seo: ‘Churchill: The Power of Words,’ at the Morgan Library
headline.main: Successes in Rhetoric: Language in the Life of Churchill
headline.print_headline: Successes In Rhetoric: Language In the Life Of Churchill
